About.backgroundText: My background is in the construction industry, where I have worked as a technology manager and developer. There I developed a passion for technology and software development, and I am currently in the process of changing my career to software development.
About.frontendText: I am developing applications with React and TypeScript, and have experience connecting external services to my applications. I leverage current tools and technologies to efectively create modern and responsive applications. I have experience in hosting these applications on Azure and AWS.
About.backendText: I also develop backend services, APIs, and databases to authenticate, run business logic, and securely send data to frontend applications. My experience is primarily in Node.js and ASP.NET Core.
About.lowcodeText: I have experience in developing applications on low code platforms such as Power Automate and Dynamo for Revit. In order to provide quick and powerful business value at a low cost.

Intro.introText: I am a software developer with a passion and drive to help people. My background is in engineering and I am currently studying to become a full stack developer.
